text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ParticipationInformationGenerator

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a _ParticipationInformationGenerator

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ParticipationInformationGeneratorParticipationInformationGeneratorParties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g., consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g., informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g., informant witness).

name: ParticipationInformationGenerator
title: ParticipationInformationGenerator
description: Parties that may or should contribute or have contributed information to the Act. Such information includes information leading to the decision to perform the Act and how to perform the Act (e.g., consultant), information that the Act itself seeks to reveal (e.g., informant of clinical history), or information about what Act was performed (e.g., informant witness).
